00011 //: Functor object to compute distance between two vectors
00012 template<class T>
00013 class mbl_vector_distance {
00014 public:
00015   static double d(const vnl_vector<T>& v1,
00016                   const vnl_vector<T>& v2)
00017    { return vcl_sqrt(vnl_vector_ssd(v1,v2)); }
00018 };
